item.title: Command and Conquer 2
item.description:
###Position From FullCircle issue 24, to issue 55 ###C&C 11 This chapter tells you how to automatical your tasks using crontab. Useful commands find /var/logs/ -name "*.log" | while read line; do cat "${line}"; done sudo crontab -e root crontab format:
Example: */5 * * * * command Every 5 minutes 00 18 * * sun command Every Sunday at 6 * */2 * * * command Every 2 hours

item.title: Command and Conquer 1
item.description: ###Position: From FullCircle 13, Ended at FullCircle 23. ###C&C 1 Try to run following command: man man man -k PDF man apropos apropos PDF man --help Fastly get help from manual, for example, following command will let you dive into regex: man -k regex re_comp (3) - BSD regex functions re_exec (3) - BSD regex functions regcomp (3) - POSIX regex functions regerror (3) - POSIX regex functions regex (3) - POSIX regex functions regex (7) - POSIX.
